articles.description: Wall Street Zen upgraded shares of Lyft (NASDAQ:LYFT – Free Report) from a hold rating to a buy rating in a report published on Saturday morning. LYFT has been the subject of several other research reports. DA Davidson reissued a “neutral” rating and set a $1…
